about.heading: About Me
about.content: I am Suneel Kumar from Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan. With a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Institute of Business Administration, I have gained hands-on experience in data analytics, business intelligence, and project management through various internships and roles. I specialize in Statistics, Regression Analysis, and Python programming, and I am passionate about transforming data into actionable insights.

jobs.description: Collaborated on the 11.11 sale project by analyzing operational data to optimize inventory management and streamline logistics. Utilized Excel, Power BI, and SQL to create interactive dashboards and reports, supporting data-driven decision-making.

Supported over 150 students in Business Intelligence and Speech Communication courses. Assisted with grading, tutorials, quizzes, and assignments, contributing to academic integrity and effective course management.
Conducted on-site data collection to assess resource availability in family planning offices. Implemented digital tools for seamless data collection and real-time insights.
Performed detailed data analysis and built predictive models using Excel and Python. Designed and implemented interactive dashboards with Power BI to enable data-driven decisions.
Led the implementation of an LMS portal during the Covid-19 pandemic, doubling student participation. Prepared study and training materials and managed daily activities for program improvement.
Implemented targeted educational initiatives that reduced children's dropout rates by 30% in Tharparkar. Analyzed educational challenges and presented innovative solutions.
Collaborated with a team of Environmental Science students to initiate projects aimed at controlling climate change.

list.name: 11.11 Sale Project Dashboard
list.description: Developed interactive dashboards and reports at Daraz to optimize inventory management and streamline logistics during the high-demand 11.11 sale.

list.name: Predictive Data Models
list.description: Built predictive models using Python and Excel at AdjenX, generating actionable insights to support strategic decisions.

certifications.heading: Certifications
list: Career Essentials in Data Analysis by Microsoft and LinkedIn
